original_text: She went into the house and she stood behind Jesus. She was crying and she made his feet wet with her tears. Then she made his feet dry again with her hair and she kissed them. She then poured the oil out of the jar onto his feet.
korean_text: 예수의 뒤로 그 발 곁에 서서 울며 눈물로 그 발을 적시고 자기 머리털로 닦고 그 발에 입맞추고 향유를 부으니

sentences.original_text: and she made his feet wet with her tears
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신의 눈물로 그분의 발을 적셨다

sentences.original_text: Then she made his feet dry again with her hair
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그녀는 자신의 머리카락으로 그분의 발을 다시 닦았다

sentences.original_text: She then poured the oil out of the jar onto his feet
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그런 다음 항아리에서 기름을 그분의 발에 부었다
